item.content:encoded:
Welcome to NeverOutOfBeta! Tucked away in a dark corner of the City Arms, Carey and Gav are joined by Warren this week to talk about topics including:

  • Security
  • LulzSec, distributed attacks, hacker culture
  • Phone hacking
  • Clean code
  • Version control
  • Programming paradigms
  • Technical culture
  • … and more!
Download NeverOutOfBeta_episode_0.9.1.mp3 (79.5mb) (File mirrored by @woogoose)

Disclaimer: all opinions are representative of the individuals involved. This is just something we’re doing for fun; it’s possible you may find it informative but bear in mind any “facts” you hear may be unsubstantiated, exaggerated or imagined, so always do the research!
